trans-unit.source: Represents the possible values for a top-level node on a foreign machine.
`RegistryHive` values are used by the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey%2A> method to represent the top-level node of a requested key on a foreign (remote) machine.
The node that can be opened with the OpenRemoteBaseKey method must be one of these top-level `RegistryKeys`.
Further access to the subkeys of the identified node is available using using methods in <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey>, so long as the the user has appropriate permission.
Represents the HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT base key on another computer.
This value can be passed to the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)"></xref> method, to open this node remotely.
Represents the HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG base key on another computer.
This value can be passed to the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)"></xref> method, to open this node remotely.
Represents the HKEY_CURRENT_USER base key on another computer.
This value can be passed to the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)"></xref> method, to open this node remotely.
Represents the HKEY_DYN_DATA base key on another computer.
This value can be passed to the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)"></xref> method, to open this node remotely.
Represents the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE base key on another computer.
This value can be passed to the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)"></xref> method, to open this node remotely.
Represents the HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA base key on another computer.
This value can be passed to the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)"></xref> method, to open this node remotely.
Represents the HKEY_USERS base key on another computer.
This value can be passed to the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.OpenRemoteBaseKey(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryHive,System.String)"></xref> method, to open this node remotely.
